title: About us
headline: Who's behind the EUROMAT?
content: The EUROMAT was developed as a joint project of the Young European Federalists, Pulse of Europe, Polis180 and the blog “Der (europäische) Föderalist”, which together represent a broad spectrum of pro-European civil society in Germany. All four organisations are party-politically independent. A dedicated team of volunteers worked together on the implementation, drafting the theses, obtaining the opinions of the parties and technically implementing the EUROMAT.
